Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MancalaModel, PitModel

    public abstract class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base class representing a data model in MVC.
    Author:
    Jeremy Asuncion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model()
      Constructs a new model object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
      Adds a change listener to the model.
      void clearChangeListeners()
      Removes all change listeners from the model.
      abstract void commitChange()
      Commits the changes to the data model.
      protected void invokeListeners()
      Invokes all change listeners with the current object instance as the change event.
      abstract void undoChange()
      Undos the most recent change to the data model.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model()
        Constructs a new model object.

    • Method Detail

      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
        Adds a change listener to the model.
        Parameters:
        listener - A change listener
        See Also:
        ChangeListener

      • clearChangeListeners

        public void clearChangeListeners()
        Removes all change listeners from the model.

      • invokeListeners

        protected void invokeListeners()
        Invokes all change listeners with the current object instance as the change event.

      • commitChange

        public abstract void commitChange()
        Commits the changes to the data model. The state is then moved to the current state. When the data is committed, the change listeners should be invoked by calling invokeListeners()
        See Also:
        invokeListeners()

      • undoChange

        public abstract void undoChange()
        Undos the most recent change to the data model. Used by the Mancala game since undos are allowed.
